ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Conflict-managed SAR drone tactics balancing coverage, safety, and communications reliability.

bullets.item: Mesh relays and spectrum management to reduce interference.
Energy-aware tasking with emergency return-to-home triggers.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Define safe corridors and separation rules with human override.
Mesh relay nodes and channel hopping for robust comms.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Battery buffers with auto-RTH and contingency landing sites.
